gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 107, Kings 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks didnt take a lead until the 6:21 mark in the fourth quarter, but after an exciting finish, held on to win, 107-103. Kyrie Irving led Dallas with 30 points (14 PTS, 4-4 FG, 2-2 3PM, 4-5 FT in Q4) as Luka Doncic added 26 points, nine rebounds, and 12 assists. DeAaron Fox totaled 23 points a Domantas Sabonis totaled 13 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists in his 26th triple-double of the year. Dallas has now won 6 straight and the 10th of their last 11th as they improve to 44-29 while the Kings move to 42-31.
